ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You look raring
to go, as always!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been
waiting for you! I’m so glad to see you today!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
I don’t have any use for it myself... Please use it if
you’d like.
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
I thought you might need it... Please go ahead and
use it!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! There’s something I’d
like to give you...
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I thought this might be useful, so I made sure to
get you one.
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2103_03_10: I really hope you like it!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I want to hear more about you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I’ve been looking forward to having a real
conversation with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Is this for me? Thank you!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2301_01_10: I’ve been wanting this! Thank you!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’ll bring a present for you next time,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Thanks for chatting with me! Let’s chat
again sometime!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Thanks for chatting with me! That was really fun!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8201_2401_02_10: Let’s talk again sometime! I’ll be waiting!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
I feel so excited... Just like I did while adventuring
around Alola!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Let’s do our best to make this room a place where
everyone can have fun!
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Pokémon all have different likes and dislikes,
just like people do.
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
Some of them don’t like battling, but others really
love it.
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
So it’s not fair of me to keep them from battling
just because I don’t want to battle.
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8002_0701_04_10: I kind of know how they feel...
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
As part of my plan to get better at sewing, I went
and looked at a bunch of different plush toys in
Pasio’s shops.
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
But all I could see was them staring back at me
with their adorable little eyes...
ch0118_00_lillie_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Ahhh! No, I can’t give in! I’ve got my own
dear Clefairy!
